page.title: 07HOME LIFE
page.content: I wake up as my brother is leaving for his paper round. Then I go back to sleep. My father wakes me up at seven thirty with a cup of tea. I get up and let the cat out! I have breakfast, get my bag ready for school, and let the cat in again! I walk to school with my friend. School begins at 9 o'clock. After school finishes at three thirty we walk home. We have a biscuit then watch television while we have our tea. If the weather is nice I play on the beach with my friends. If it's bad I like to play board games. At 8.30 we have supper, I watch television for a while then go to bed and read before I go to sleep.
